⚠️ Deprecation Notice: This component (Map Reduce) is no longer actively maintained. It remains accessible for historical reference but is not recommended for new development. Please check out Qumat - Mahout's Quantum Computing Primer for the latest innovations.

{excerpt}MapReduce is a framework for processing huge datasets on certain kinds of distributable problems using a large number of computers (nodes), collectively referred to as a cluster.{excerpt} Computational processing can occur on data stored either in a filesystem (unstructured) or within a database (structured).
